name.baseName: Highly Concentrated Brine Production ; Highly Concentrated Brine (6% Lithium) ; Solar Pond Evaporation ; Salar de Cauchari, Argentina (0.05% Lithium)
高浓卤水生产 ; 高浓卤水（锂含量4.3%） ; 太阳池蒸发法 ; 阿根廷考查里盐湖（锂含量0.05%）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The future supply routes reviewed in this study are based on data gathered from technical reports and environmental impact assessment reports of several lithium mining and processing companies (Lithium Americas Corp., Minera Salar Blanco, Nemaska Lithium Inc., and Keliber Oy) that are at various stages of developing their lithium assets. These are considered future supply routes as they are not yet active but areexpected to be operational in 5–10 years. The lower lithium concentrations at these brine-based sources also reflect the possible future lithium grades of current supply routes from brines, whose lithium concentrations will likely decrease over the years due to extraction

本研究审查的未来供应路线是基于从几家锂矿开采和加工公司（Lithium Americas Corp.、Minera Salar Blanco、Nemaska Lithium Inc.和Keliber Oy）的技术报告和环境影响评估报告中收集的数据，这些公司的锂资产正处于不同的开发阶段。这些锂资产正处于不同的开发阶段。预计在 5-10 年内投入运营。这些以卤水为基础的来源的锂浓度较低，也反映了当前供应路线中卤水的未来锂品位。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The brine-based future supply routes for production of LiOH⋅H2O are similar to the current supply routes and represent operations at Salar de Cauchari, Argentina and Salar de Maricunga, Chile. These are two other locations within the “lithium triangle”, where considerable lithium reserves exist. The average lithium concentrations at Cauchari and Maricunga are 0.05% and 0.09%, respectively. This influences the energy and chemical use, and to some extent the technical process designs at these facilities. The process information for the brine extraction operations in Salar de Cauchari was gathered from several technical reports prepared for Lithium Americas Corporation (Burga et al., 2020; Worley Parsons, 2011). Similarly, process information for operations in the Salar de Maricunga was derived from technical reports prepared for Minera Salar Blanco (Atacama Water Consultants, 2022). When impacts from these future supply datasets for the brine route were calculated for comparative purposes, data from the specific reviewed sources were used until Li2CO3 production. After that step, Ecoinvent v3.8′ s unit process for converting Li2CO3 to LiOH⋅H2O was again used to model the final production step, and thereby fill the data gaps in the complete production process, for comparability with the other datasets modeled in the study.

基于卤水的未来锂OH⋅H2O 生产供应路线与当前供应路线类似，代表了阿根廷考查里盐湖和智利马里孔加盐湖的运营情况。这两个地方位于 "锂三角"，锂储量可观。考查里盐湖和马里昆加盐湖的平均锂浓度分别为 0.05% 和 0.09%。这影响了能源和化学品的使用，并在一定程度上影响了这些设施的技术工艺设计。Salar de Cauchari 盐湖卤水提取作业的工艺信息来自为美洲锂业公司（Lithium Americas Corporation）编写的几份技术报告（Burga 等人，2020 年；Worley Parsons，2011 年）。同样，马里孔加盐湖的开采工艺信息也来自为 Minera Salar Blanco 公司编写的技术报告（Atacama Water Consultants, 2022）。在计算这些未来供应数据集对盐水路线的影响以进行比较时，使用了特定审查来源的数据，直至生产出 Li2CO3。在该步骤之后，再次使用 Ecoinvent v3.8′ 将 Li2CO3 转化为 LiOH⋅H2O 的单元过程来模拟最后的生产步骤，从而填补完整生产过程中的数据空白，以便与本研究中模拟的其他数据集进行比较。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This highly concentrated brine with 6% lithium content, obtained using solar pond evaporation method, is specifically designed for the production of lithium compounds, which are essential in the manufacture of lithium-ion batteries. These batteries are widely used in electric vehicles (EVs), portable electronics, and large-scale energy storage systems.
该高浓度卤水（锂含量6%），采用太阳能池塘蒸发法获得，专门用于生产锂化合物，这是锂离子电池制造不可或缺的原料。这些电池广泛应用于电动汽车（EVs）、便携式电子设备以及大规模能源储存系统。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Chordia, M., Wickerts, S., Nordelöf, A. & Arvidsson, R. Life cycle environmental impacts of current and future battery-grade lithium supply from brine and spodumene. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 187, 106634 (2022).

Chordia, M., Wickerts, S., Nordelöf, A. & Arvidsson, R. Life cycle environmental impacts of current and future battery-grade lithium supply from brine and spodumene. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 187, 106634 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for life cycle assessment, users need to consider that the production processes for raw materials and energy flows with very small amounts (less than 1%) are not included. It is recommended to include these processes through additional data sources if they are significant for the intended application. For battery production, potential environmental impacts from various stages - including material extraction, manufacturing, distribution, use, and disposal - should be taken into account according to methodological guidelines.
当使用该数据集进行生命周期评估时，用户需注意原材料的生产过程和能源流未包括极少量（小于1%）的数据。如果这些过程对预期应用有重大影响，推荐通过额外的数据来源来包含它们。对于电池生产，应根据方法论指导方针考虑各个阶段的潜在环境影响，包括材料提取、制造、分销、使用和处置。

completeness.common:other: The production processes for raw materials and energy flows with very small amounts (less than 1%) are not included.
原材料的生产流程和极少量（小于 1%）的能源流未包括在内。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
